Package com.databaseproject

Class WebScraper

  • Object
    • WebScraper
  • public class WebScraper
extends Object
    This class is used to retrieve data from a specified website.
    Version:
    2.0 This version introduces Java Servlets and JSP
    Author:
    Rachel Friedman

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveDataFromWebsite

        public byte[] retrieveDataFromWebsite​(String urlAddress)
        Retrieves data from website specified in urlAddress file.
        Parameters:
        urlAddress - the website to retrieve data from
        Returns:
        the content from that website

      • saveToFile

        public String saveToFile​(String filename,
                         byte[] data)
        Saves data to a specified csv file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name and location of the csv file
        data - the data to be saved to the file
        Returns:
        the name of each column header along with its data type. This string can then be used in an SQL statement when creating a table.

      • getHeaderRow

        private static ArrayList<String> getHeaderRow​(String filename)
        Helper method to aid in retrieving header row from csv file
        Parameters:
        filename - the csv file with the header row
        Returns:
        all column names in header row (data types not included)
